import React from "react"; import { useRecipe } from "../../context/RecipeContext"; import "./Card.scss"; function Card() { const { data } = useRecipe(); return (
{data.map((item, _) => item.name ? (

{item.name}

{item.username}
) : null )}
); } export default Card;
